description: oversized coin with small central portrait of Columbus and 3 ships on one side; text and 2 shields on opposite side
markings: on back, in relief: [OCTOBER · XII  M·C·C·C·C·XCII· / TO · COMMEMORATE · THE · FOVR / HUNDREDTH · ANNIVERSARY · OF / THE · DISCOVERY · OF · AMERICA · BY / CHRISTOPHER · COLVMBVS / BY · AVTHORITY · OF · THE / COMMITTEE · OF · ONE / HVNDRED · CITIZENS / OF · NEW · YORK / OCTOBER · XII  M·D·C·C·C·XCII·]
title: Christopher Columbus Commemorative Medal
